title: Google\Cloud\AIPlatform\V1\NfsMount
name: NfsMount
description:
Represents a mount configuration for Network File System (NFS) to mount.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.NfsMount

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.server
params.description: Required. IP address of the NFS server.

params.name: data.path
params.description: Required. Source path exported from NFS server. Has to start with '/', and combined with the ip address, it indicates the source mount path in the form of server:path

params.name: data.mount_point
params.description: Required. Destination mount path. The NFS will be mounted for the user under /mnt/nfs/

methods.name: getServer
methods.description:
